description: Students work intensively on a special topic in applied mathematics. Topics vary from year to year. May be repeated if topic is different. Offered periodically.
name: Sem: Stochastic Processes
notes: Prerequisite: MATH 262 and (MATH 244, MATH 252, or instructor permission).
prerequisites: MATH 262 and (MATH 244, MATH 252, or instructor permission).
title: Topics in Applied Mathematics
